trans-unit.source: Provides properties and methods to prepare series data for technical analysis, apply formulas on the series data and prepare output data to be displayed as a chart.
The actual calculations are performed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StatisticFormula"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataFormula"></xref> class.
Merges, splits or moves Y values in the series.
A comma-separated list of input data series names and optional X and Y value names.
A comma-separated list of output data series names and optional X and Y value names.
Calls a method from a formula module with the specified formula name and input series name(s).
Formula name.
A comma-separated list of input series names and optional X and Y value names.
Calls a method from a formula module with the specified formula name and input series.
Formula name.
Input series.
Calls a method from a formula module with the specified formula name, input series name(s) and output series name(s).
Formula name.
A comma-separated list of input series names and optional X and Y value names.
A comma-separated list of output series names and optional X and Y value names.
Calls a method from a formula module with the specified formula name, input series and output series.
Formula name.
The input series.
The output series.
Calls a method from a formula module with the specified formula name, formula parameters, input series name(s) and output series name(s).
Formula name.
Formula parameters.
A comma-separated list of input series names and optional X and Y value names.
A comma-separated list of output series names and optional X and Y value names.
Calls a method from a formula module with the specified formula name, formula parameters, input series and output series.
Formula name.
Formula parameters.
The input series.
The output series.
Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether empty points are ignored while performing calculations.
Returns value is `true`, empty points are ignored during calculations.
Otherwise, empty points are treated as zeroes.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if empty points are ignored, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether to start formulas such as a rolling average from zero.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if formulas such as "rolling average" start from zero; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
Returns a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StatisticFormula"></xref> class.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StatisticFormula"></xref> object.
